syllables: the UK 是由两个单词组成的缩写，“the” 的音节为 /ðə/（单音节），“UK” 的音标为 /juːˈkeɪ/，根据发音规则可划分为两个音节 /juː/ 和 /keɪ/。但题目要求针对整体生成 syllables，结合 Collins 词典中对缩写词音节的处理习惯，整体划分为 the
UK 并不符合纯音节划分逻辑，严格按音标拆分 “UK” 为 u
kay，而 “the” 为单音节，综合考虑任务示例及语言习惯，此处以 “UK” 的音标音节为核心，正确划分应为 u

sentences.en: The UK is an island country in Europe.

sentences.zh: 我们周末经常去乡村散步。

sentences.en: We often visit my grandparents in the countryside.
sentences.zh: 我们经常去乡下看望我的祖父母。

sentences.en: There are many fresh vegetables and fruits in the countryside.
sentences.zh: 乡下有许多新鲜的蔬菜和水果。

sentences.en: I went to the park yesterday.
sentences.zh: 我昨天去了公园。

sentences.en: Yesterday was a sunny day.
sentences.zh: 昨天是晴朗的一天。

sentences.en: The flower in the garden is very beautiful.
sentences.zh: 花园里的花非常漂亮。

sentences.en: She likes to pick flowers in spring.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢在春天摘花。

sentences.en: Don't worry, everything will be okay.
sentences.zh: 别担心，一切都会好起来的。

sentences.en: She has a lot of worry about her exams.
sentences.zh: 她很担心她的考试。

sentences.en: Luckily, I caught the last bus home.
sentences.zh: 幸运的是，我赶上了回家的末班车。

sentences.en: She luckily found her lost keys under the sofa.
sentences.zh: 她幸运地在沙发底下找到了丢失的钥匙。

sentences.en: The sun rises in the east.
sentences.zh: 太阳从东方升起。

sentences.en: We can feel the sun's warmth.
sentences.zh: 我们能感受到太阳的温暖。

sentences.en: Fire can burn things.
sentences.zh: 火能燃烧东西。

sentences.en: We must be careful with fire.
sentences.zh: 我们必须小心火。

sentences.en: The fire station is where firefighters work and wait for emergencies.
sentences.zh: 消防站是消防员工作和等待紧急情况的地方。

sentences.en: When there is a fire, people call the fire station for help.
sentences.zh: 当发生火灾时，人们会打电话给消防站求助。

sentences.en: She likes painting colorful pictures.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢画色彩鲜艳的画。

sentences.en: We are learning painting in art class.
sentences.zh: 我们正在美术课上学习绘画。

zh: 使人兴奋的；令人激动的

sentences.en: The children are having an exciting game in the park.
sentences.zh: 孩子们正在公园里玩一个令人兴奋的游戏。

sentences.en: She told me an exciting story about her trip to Africa.
sentences.zh: 她给我讲了一个关于她非洲之旅的令人兴奋的故事。

sentences.en: The lovely cat is playing with a ball.
sentences.zh: 这只可爱的猫正在玩球。

sentences.en: She has a lovely smile.
sentences.zh: 她有一个可爱的笑容。

sentences.en: This watch is too expensive for me to buy.
sentences.zh: 这块手表太贵了，我买不起。

sentences.en: Eating at that restaurant is always expensive.
sentences.zh: 在那家餐厅吃饭总是很贵。

sentences.en: This shirt is very cheap.
sentences.zh: 这件衬衫很便宜。

sentences.en: She bought some cheap books online.
sentences.zh: 她在网上买了一些便宜的书。

sentences.en: Please speak slowly so I can understand.
sentences.zh: 请说慢一点，这样我能听懂。

sentences.en: The old man walks slowly in the park.
sentences.zh: 这位老人在公园里慢慢地走。

sentences.en: A cheetah is a fast animal.
sentences.zh: 猎豹是一种跑得快的动物。

sentences.en: She runs fast to catch the bus.
sentences.zh: 她跑得很快去赶公交车。

sentences.en: A robot can help people do many things.
sentences.zh: 机器人能帮助人们做很多事情。

sentences.en: I want to build a smart robot in the future.
sentences.zh: 我将来想制造一个智能机器人。

sentences.en: The guide showed us around the museum.
sentences.zh: 导游带我们参观了博物馆。

sentences.en: You can follow this guide to solve the problem.
sentences.zh: 你可以按照这个指南来解决问题。

sentences.en: She gave me a gift on my birthday.
sentences.zh: 她在我生日那天给了我一份礼物。

sentences.en: This gift is from my best friend.
sentences.zh: 这份礼物是我最好的朋友送的。

sentences.en: All in all, the trip was a great success.
sentences.zh: 总而言之，这次旅行非常成功。

sentences.en: All in all, we need to work harder next term.
sentences.zh: 总的来说，我们下学期需要更努力学习。

sentences.en: Everything is ready for the party.
sentences.zh: 派对的一切都准备好了。

sentences.en: She knows everything about this city.
sentences.zh: 她了解这座城市的一切。

sentences.en: She is interested in reading books.
sentences.zh: 她对读书感兴趣。

sentences.en: They are interested in playing football.
sentences.zh: 他们对踢足球感兴趣。

sentences.en: She is interested in reading science fiction books.
sentences.zh: 她对阅读科幻小说感兴趣。

sentences.en: Many students are interested in learning new languages.
sentences.zh: 许多学生对学习新语言感兴趣。

sentences.en: It gets dark at night.
sentences.zh: 夜晚天黑了。

sentences.en: The room is dark without lights.
sentences.zh: 没有灯的房间是黑暗的。

sentences.en: I can hear birds singing outside the window.
sentences.zh: 我能听到窗外鸟儿在唱歌。

sentences.en: Did you hear the teacher's question just now?
sentences.zh: 你刚才听到老师的问题了吗？

sentences.en: We will go to summer camp next month.
sentences.zh: 我们下个月要去夏令营。

sentences.en: They set up a camp by the river.
sentences.zh: 他们在河边搭了一个营地。

sentences.en: We went fishing by the lake yesterday.
sentences.zh: 昨天我们去湖边钓鱼了。

sentences.en: The lake is surrounded by green trees.
sentences.zh: 这个湖被绿树环绕着。

sentences.en: We often play on the beach in summer.
sentences.zh: 夏天我们经常在沙滩上玩。

sentences.en: The beach is covered with golden sand.
sentences.zh: 沙滩上覆盖着金色的沙子。

sentences.en: I often play badminton with my friends after school.
sentences.zh: 放学后我经常和朋友们打羽毛球。

sentences.en: Badminton is a popular sport that requires a racket and a shuttlecock.
sentences.zh: 羽毛球是一项需要球拍和羽毛球的流行运动。

sentences.en: The sheep is eating grass in the field.
sentences.zh: 这只绵羊正在田里吃草。

sentences.en: We can see a flock of sheep on the hill.
sentences.zh: 我们能在山上看到一群绵羊。

sentences.en: I want to be a doctor as my father.
sentences.zh: 我想成为一名像我父亲一样的医生。

sentences.en: She runs fast as a cheetah.
sentences.zh: 她跑得像猎豹一样快。

sentences.en: It is natural for birds to fly.
sentences.zh: 鸟会飞是很自然的事。

sentences.en: She has a natural ability to sing.
sentences.zh: 她有唱歌的天赋（天生的能力）。

sentences.en: A butterfly has colorful wings.
sentences.zh: 蝴蝶有彩色的翅膀。

sentences.en: The butterfly flies from flower to flower.
sentences.zh: 蝴蝶从一朵花飞到另一朵花。

sentences.en: The visitor is coming to our school.
sentences.zh: 这位访客要来我们学校了。

sentences.en: We should be polite to the visitor.
sentences.zh: 我们应该对访客有礼貌。

syllables: tired 是单音节词，因此正确的 syllables 输出为：tired

sentences.en: After a long day at school, I feel tired.
sentences.zh: 在学校度过漫长的一天后，我感到很累。

sentences.en: She was too tired to finish her homework last night.
sentences.zh: 昨晚她太累了，没法完成作业。

sentences.en: I want to stay at home today.
sentences.zh: 我今天想待在家里。

sentences.en: You can stay here for a while.
sentences.zh: 你可以在这里待一会儿。

sentences.en: It's not good for your health to stay up late often.
sentences.zh: 经常熬夜对你的健康不好。

sentences.en: I have to stay up late tonight to finish my homework.
sentences.zh: 我今晚不得不熬夜完成作业。

sentences.en: She is away on vacation.
sentences.zh: 她外出度假了。

sentences.en: The cat ran away quickly.
sentences.zh: 那只猫飞快地跑开了。

sentences.en: The little girl tried to run away from the big dog.
sentences.zh: 小女孩试图从大狗身边逃跑。

sentences.en: He decided to run away to find a better life in the city.
sentences.zh: 他决定逃跑去城市寻找更好的生活。

sentences.en: The mouse is small.
sentences.zh: 这只老鼠很小。

sentences.en: I see a mouse.
sentences.zh: 我看到一只老鼠。

sentences.en: The baby is crying.
sentences.zh: 这个宝宝在哭。

sentences.en: I love my baby.
sentences.zh: 我爱我的宝宝。

sentences.en: He had to shout to be heard over the noise.
sentences.zh: 为了盖过噪音，他不得不大声喊叫。

sentences.en: She gave a loud shout of joy when she won.
sentences.zh: 她获胜时高兴地大喊了一声。

sentences.en: Don't shout at your friends when you are angry.
sentences.zh: 生气的时候不要对你的朋友大喊大叫。

sentences.en: The teacher had to shout at the students to get their attention.
sentences.zh: 老师不得不对学生们大喊以引起他们的注意。

sentences.en: The dog goes woof.
sentences.zh: 狗发出汪汪声。

sentences.en: I hear a woof from the dog.
sentences.zh: 我听到狗发出一声汪汪叫。

sentences.en: English is my favorite language.
sentences.zh: 英语是我最喜欢的语言。

sentences.en: We learn a new language every year.
sentences.zh: 我们每年学习一门新语言。

sentences.en: Birds can fly high in the sky.
sentences.zh: 鸟儿能在天空高飞。

sentences.en: I want to fly a kite on a windy day.
sentences.zh: 我想在有风的日子放风筝。

sentences.en: I like to fly a kite in the park.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢在公园里放风筝。

sentences.en: The kite is flying high in the sky.
sentences.zh: 风筝在天空中飞得很高。

sentences.en: I like to fly a kite in the park.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢在公园里放风筝。

sentences.en: Can you teach me how to fly a kite?
sentences.zh: 你能教我怎么放风筝吗？

sentences.en: The mountain is high.
sentences.zh: 这座山很高。

sentences.en: He jumped high into the air.
sentences.zh: 他高高地跳进了空中。

sentences.en: She left the room five minutes ago.
sentences.zh: 她五分钟前离开了房间。

sentences.en: I finished my homework an hour ago.
sentences.zh: 我一小时前完成了作业。

sentences.en: India is a country in South Asia.
sentences.zh: 印度是南亚的一个国家。

sentences.en: The capital of India is New Delhi.
sentences.zh: 印度的首都是新德里。

sentences.en: We put up a tent in the forest.
sentences.zh: 我们在森林里搭起了一个帐篷。

sentences.en: Sleeping in a tent is an interesting experience.
sentences.zh: 睡在帐篷里是一次有趣的经历。

sentences.en: We need to put up the tent before dark.
sentences.zh: 我们需要在天黑前搭起帐篷。

sentences.en: She put up a poster on the wall to advertise the event.
sentences.zh: 她在墙上贴了一张海报来宣传这个活动。

sentences.en: The moon shines brightly at night.
sentences.zh: 月亮在夜晚明亮地照耀着。

sentences.en: We can see the moon in the sky.
sentences.zh: 我们可以在天空中看到月亮。

sentences.en: They help each other with homework.
sentences.zh: 他们互相帮助做作业。

sentences.en: Friends should care about each other.
sentences.zh: 朋友应该互相关心。

sentences.en: What a nice surprise to see you here!
sentences.zh: 在这里见到你真是个惊喜！

sentences.en: She planned a surprise party for her friend.
sentences.zh: 她为朋友策划了一场惊喜派对。

sentences.en: My friend wants to get a surprise.
sentences.zh: 我的朋友想要得到一个惊喜。

sentences.en: Can you help me get a surprise for her?
sentences.zh: 你能帮我给她准备一个惊喜吗？

sentences.en: A snake is a long, thin reptile with no legs.
sentences.zh: 蛇是一种长而细、没有腿的爬行动物。

sentences.en: The snake slithered quietly through the grass.
sentences.zh: 那条蛇静静地爬过草地。

sentences.en: She felt scared when she heard the loud thunder.
sentences.zh: 听到响亮的雷声时，她感到害怕。

sentences.en: The little boy was scared to go into the dark room alone.
sentences.zh: 小男孩害怕独自走进黑暗的房间。

sentences.en: I need to move the chair to the corner.
sentences.zh: 我需要把椅子移到角落。

sentences.en: Can you help me move this heavy box?
sentences.zh: 你能帮我搬这个重箱子吗？

sentences.en: I want to shout to my friend across the street.
sentences.zh: 我想对街对面的朋友大喊。

sentences.en: She likes to shout to express her excitement.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢通过大喊来表达她的兴奋。

sentences.en: The word starts with 's'.
sentences.zh: 这个单词以's'开头。

sentences.en: We start our class now.
sentences.zh: 我们现在开始上课。

sentences.en: I can jump high.
sentences.zh: 我能跳得高。

sentences.en: We like to jump rope.
sentences.zh: 我们喜欢跳绳。

sentences.en: The ball is bouncing up and down.
sentences.zh: 球在上下弹跳。

sentences.en: He walked up and down the street.
sentences.zh: 他在街上走来走去。

sentences.en: I wake up early every morning.
sentences.zh: 我每天早上都起得很早。

sentences.en: Please wake me up at 7 o'clock.
sentences.zh: 请在7点钟叫醒我。

sentences.en: I need to wake up early for school tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 我明天需要早起上学。

sentences.en: Please wake up your brother; it's time for breakfast.
sentences.zh: 请叫醒你弟弟，该吃早饭了。

sentences.en: She walked into the room quietly.
sentences.zh: 她悄悄地走进了房间。

sentences.en: We need to put the books into the box.
sentences.zh: 我们需要把书放进盒子里。

sentences.en: We went hiking in the forest yesterday.
sentences.zh: 我们昨天去森林里远足了。

sentences.en: Many animals live happily in the forest.
sentences.zh: 许多动物在森林里快乐地生活着。

sentences.en: I can hear with my ear.
sentences.zh: 我能用耳朵听。

sentences.en: This is a small ear.
sentences.zh: 这是一只小耳朵。
